com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist
Interface IAssistTagAttributeState

All Superinterfaces:
IAssistState, IAssistTagState
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAssistAttributeState
public interface IAssistTagAttributeState
extends IAssistTagState

This represents the state of a tag attribute assist request. Example: <cfinclude template="" Insight requested between the double quotes.

Author:
Oliver Tupman

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAttribute()
          Returns the name of the attribute that the user is requesting content assist on.
 java.lang.String getValueSoFar()
          Gets the attribute value so far that the user has entered.
